## RingBuffer.getPercentile() method

Calculate percentile from buffer contents (e.g., 0.5 for median, 0.95 for P95)

**Signature:**

```typescript
getPercentile(percentile: number): T | undefined;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

</td><td>

Percentile value between 0 and 1


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

T \| undefined

Percentile value or undefined if buffer is empty
